description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Slap the ugly mugs of dudes and clowns for points, multipliers, and combos while avoiding the sweet faces of ladies and cuddly animals in this addictive slap-fest!  Earn awards by completing challenges to unlock bonuses, and compare your high scores against your Xbox Live friends and the world!
description.short: Slap the ugly mugs of dudes and clowns for points, multipliers, and combos while avoiding the sweet faces of ladies and cuddly animals in this addictive slap-fest!
